content: संवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To turn or go towards, approach. {@--2@} To attack, assault (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--3@} To be or become; ते यथोक्ताः संवृत्ताः <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To happen, take place, occur. {@--5@} To be produced, arise, spring. {@--6@} To be accomplished. {@--7@} To be united, meet together. {@--8@} To fall to the lot of. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cast, throw. {@--2@} To accomplish, fulfil. {@--3@} To wrap up, envelope. {@--4@} To crumble up. {@--5@} To destroy, crush.
